title: BRIEF-Veriluma Says Unit Extended Current Contract To Australian Department Of Defence.
text:
BRIEF-Veriluma Says Unit Extended Current Contract To Australian Department Of Defence.

Stock Markets 14 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 17:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Veriluma Says Unit Extended Current Contract To Australian Department Of Defence. Oct 7 (Reuters) - Veriluma Ltd : * UNIT EXTENDED ITS CURRENT CONTRACT TO AUSTRALIAN DEPARTMENT OF DEFENCE * NEW AGREEMENT IS WORTH UP TO $760,000 AND IS IN ADDITION TO MARCH 2019 CONTRACT WORTH $1.97M

BRIEF-Veriluma Says Unit Extended Current Contract To Australian Department Of Defence.
description: BRIEF-Veriluma Says Unit Extended Current Contract To Australian Department Of Defence.
